channel.title: About on Your Name
channel.description: Recent content in About on Your Name

item.title: About
item.description: This theme is targeted at PhD or post doc researchers. It allows for an easy way to display projects as well as publications. If the user wants, through GitLab actions, they can have the website update citation counts from Google Scholar every day. Additionally, through the use of plux metrics each publication with a DOI will automatically display citation statistics. This can be turned off in the config.toml.
